title: Quotation Marks Quiz
description: Do you know where to place quotation marks and the punctuation that goes with them? Find out!

questions.question: In American English, where do commas and periods go in relation to closing quotation marks?
Which is correct in American English?
When do you use single quotation marks in American English?
options: For a quote within a quote

questions.question: Which title should be in quotation marks (not italics)?
Where does the question mark go? 'Did she say, "I'll be late"?'
options: It depends on who is asking the question

questions.question: Which is correct when the quoted material is a question?
Should you use quotation marks for indirect speech?
options: No, only direct speech uses quotation marks

questions.question: Which is an example of indirect speech (no quotation marks needed)?
options: He said that he was tired.

questions.question: Which use of quotation marks is called 'scare quotes'?
options: Using quotation marks to indicate irony or skepticism

questions.question: How do you handle a quote within a quote in American English?
options: Use italics for the inner quote
Use parentheses for the inner quote
Use single quotes inside double quotes

questions.question: Which is correct? 'She described the sunset as ___.'
options: Both are acceptable depending on context

questions.question: In a dialogue, when should you start a new paragraph?
options: Only at the end of the conversation
When a new speaker begins talking

questions.question: Which is correct for a multi-paragraph quotation?
options: Use quotes only for the first paragraph
Use single quotes for continuation paragraphs
Open quotes at the start of each paragraph but only close at the very end
Close quotes at the end of each paragraph and reopen at the start of the next

questions.question: Where do semicolons go in relation to closing quotation marks in American English?
options: Semicolons cannot be used with quotes

questions.question: Which titles should be in quotation marks?
options: Short stories, poems, and song titles
All titles should use quotation marks
